refnamediv.refpurpose: output PKCS7 structure in PEM format.

refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: int PEM_write_bio_PKCS7_stream(BIO *out, PKCS7 *p7, BIO *data, int flags);

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: PEM_write_bio_PKCS7_stream() outputs a PKCS7 structure in PEM format.
It is otherwise identical to the function SMIME_write_PKCS7().

refsection.title: NOTES
refsection.para: This function is effectively a version of the PEM_write_bio_PKCS7() supporting streaming.

refsection.title: RETURN VALUES
refsection.para: PEM_write_bio_PKCS7_stream() returns 1 for success or 0 for failure.
